summary: This adds my first two dungeons to Skyrim - Halthrak's Hideout, and Lockenhaugr.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone!

This contains my first two dungeon mods, Halthrak's Hideout and Lockenhaugr.
Here is a short description of them:

Halthrak's Hideout
------------------
- A previously abandoned small Nordic dungeon located east of Whiterun along
the river.

- Easy difficulty, suitable for characters of all levels.

- This was my first delve into the Creation Kit. As such, it is an extremely
simple and short dungeon, lasting no more than about 5 minutes.

Lockenhaugr
-----------
- This is in an ancient burial tomb, located just east of Morthal near the
mountains.

- It is of moderate difficulty, but suited for characters of all levels.

- Lockenhaugr provides roughly 15 minutes of play time.


Please feel free to rate and comment on either dungeon. If you encounter any bugs, please let me know. Hope you enjoy!
author: David Staats

files.name: Lockenhaugr
files.changelogHtml:
Lockenhaugr Dungeon Fixes:
- General lighting improvements and tweaks
- Changed dungeon entry door to a small door to match the outside door
- Moved the skeleton near the entrance to be more noticeable to help with
recognizing the exit point
- Added more transition points throughout the dungeon to add more to the
visual flow of rooms
- Fixed some room/portal issues throughout the dungeon
- Altered the located of a room activator to help guide the player better
- Added some additional lighting to the main boss chamber to help push
small story elements and help guide the player a little better
- Fixed NavMesh to allow followers to enter Lockenhaugr

files.name: Lockenhaugr
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.3 Update
-------------------
Fixes:

Halthrak's Hideout

- Fixed an issue with chests within Halthrak's Hideout affecting the entire world of Skyrim
- Fixed an issue where a door within Halthrak's Hideout was affecting the entire world of Skyrim
- Moved the hidden room switch within Halthrak's Hideout to help with player direction and clarity
- Updated the lighting in the kitchen within Halthrak's Hideout so it no longer blinks on and off based on the player's view
- Moved rubble in Halthrak's Hideout to allow for more player combat options, specifically for players who prefer archery or magic

Lockenhaugr

- Updated lighting within the Boss chamber to help the player direction and clarity
